author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Using CamelCase for package names is idiomatic. Perhaps `Secp256k1`?
Also, you can register a package directly from GitLab—no need to clone it to GitHub: https://pkg.julialang.org/registrator/ is a Web UI that allows registering arbitrary git repos.

Package is renamed, see new [pull request](https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/1733)  
This one can be closed.

> Also, you can register a package directly from GitLab—no need to clone it to GitHub: https://pkg.julialang.org/registrator/ is a Web UI that allows registering arbitrary git repos.

Many thanks !! :)
I'll try that with the next release.
